content: RE: http://www.military.com/features/0,15240,113251,00.html this may be a little off topic, but i served in Lebanon in 1983 when the BLT was bombed. I would like to know if naval units deployed to the region during that time were awarded the multi-national peacekeeping award. Best regards, V.F.Dorsey USN (RET)
reply: RE: http://www.military.com/features/0,15240,113251,00.html this may be a little off topic, but i served in Lebanon in 1983 when the BLT was bombed. title: Pentagon Reviewing Medals Criteria

content: quote: “The evolving nature of warfare demands that we review policies,” David Chu, undersecretary of defense for personnel and readiness, said in a press release. Why is Chu still around? Assuredly there must be a Democrat somewhere that could do his job ... Giving Chu the boot is "change" with which I could happily live.
